immune.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The worm regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worm makes two attacks: one with its grinding jaws and one with its stinger.

action.name: Grinding Jaws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 42 ({@damage 12d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
